name: pnp-insert-sp-library-pictures-into-word
title: Insert pictures in a SharePoint Document Library into a Word document
shortDescription: Script shows how to download and insert many pictures.
longDescription: This PowerShell script shows how to download and insert many pictures in a SharePoint Document Library into a Word document in a two-column table with file name using CLI for Microsoft 365 commands and PowerShell Script.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
